hymn.title: God has saved me from the world
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Saved from the World
hymn.chords: | C - C7/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C - G7 - | C - C7/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C F/C C - | C - C7/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C - G7 - | C - C7/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: God has saved me from the world; I'll nev -- er go back an -- y -- more. God has saved me from the world; I'll nev -- er go back an -- y -- more. No, no, no, no, no, I'll nev -- er go back an -- y -- more; No, no, no, no, no, I'll nev -- er go back an -- y -- more.

lyrics.stanza: No, no, no, no, no, I'll never go back anymore; No, no, no, no, no, I'll never go back anymore.
Since I found the local church, I'll never go back anymore. Since I found the local church, I'll never go back anymore.
Since I've touched the Lord within, I'll never go back anymore. Since I've touched the Lord within, I'll never go back anymore.
